tasks.title: Load .env for Redmine settings
tasks.description: Ensure agentctl loads the repo .env before backend initialization so Redmine env config is honored.

tasks.title: Clarify planner task tags + deps
tasks.description: Require PLANNER to review existing tags, apply the minimal set for navigation, and set dependencies when possible.

tasks.title: Prune legacy paths and optimize agentctl
tasks.description: Remove legacy workspace/PR fallback paths (keep legacy ID reid), add task normalize, use backend export fast path, reduce redundant backend writes, add per-run task cache, and unify repeated error messaging in agentctl.
